body.name: Lenovo 300 Wireless Keyboard, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Optimal for Flexible Workspaces: The Lenovo 300 Wireless Compact Keyboard is the perfect companion for modern flexible working environments. Its compact size ensures easy storage, fitting neatly into lockers and desk spaces when not in use, promoting a clutter-free workspace.

Enhanced Productivity: Featuring 11 Fn keys with shortcut functions, this keyboard offers improved productivity. These shortcut functions are conveniently within easy reach, allowing users to swiftly navigate applications, execute commands, and manage tasks efficiently, thus streamlining workflow.

Effortless Number Crunching: The inclusion of a dedicated numeric keypad makes number crunching a breeze. Whether you're handling financial calculations, data entry, or other numerical tasks, the keyboard's numeric keypad ensures accurate and efficient input, saving time and reducing errors.

Whisper-Quiet Operation: The Lenovo 300 Keyboard boasts a silent typing experience, with key clicks emitting a mere 45 dB noise level. This feature is particularly advantageous in shared workspaces, enabling users to maintain focus and avoid disrupting colleagues while typing.

Seamless Wireless Connectivity: The keyboard's plug-and-play wireless connection, facilitated by a USB receiver, guarantees hassle-free setup. Users can swiftly connect the keyboard to their device without the need for complex installations, ensuring a smooth and efficient start to work. Additionally, powered by a single AA battery, the keyboard offers convenient and long-lasting usage.
body.description: Say goodbye to clutter and hello to streamlined efficiency. The Lenovo 300 keyboard's compact size is tailor-made for modern workspaces. Easily stow it away in lockers or desk drawers when it's not in use, effortlessly optimizing your workspace and promoting an organized atmosphere. Unlock your true potential with enhanced productivity at your fingertips. The keyboard's Fn keys come armed with shortcut functions, strategically positioned for quick and intuitive access. Seamlessly navigate through tasks, applications, and commands with ease, allowing you to stay focused and in control throughout your workday. But that's not all – we understand the importance of numerical tasks in your workflow. The Lenovo 300 doesn't just stop at typing; it empowers your number-crunching endeavors. With a dedicated numeric keypad right at your fingertips, you'll breeze through calculations, data entry, and spreadsheets like never before. Efficiency meets precision in a way that only this keyboard can deliver.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 126 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compact. Portable. Lightweight. The Lenovo 300 Wireless Compact Keyboard is ideal for a flexible working environment, whether at the office or working from home. The compact keyboard balances functionality with portability, providing a full 2-zone layout with a number pad and cursor control keys for maximum versatility. This wireless keyboard is slim and lightweight, making it easy to store in a locker or laptop bag when not in use. You'll find everything you need on this simple, compact keyboard.

Design you can trust The Fn keys with shortcut functions are within easy reach for improved productivity, while LED indicators let you know when the caps lock or number lock is engaged, or when the battery is low (AAA battery included). Number crunching is also made easy with the dedicated numeric keypad.

Truly Wireless Experience Perfect for business travelers, students, or anyone who needs a simple, portable keyboard that can travel with them, the Lenovo 300 wireless keyboard offers plug-and-play technology – just plug the USB-A receiver dongle into your laptop computer (or any PC with an available USB-A port) and you're ready to work.

Uncompromising functionality The keyboard is built slim & light for easy maneuvering. It’s got a full 2-zone layout with cursor control keys and a numpad for maximum versatility. Plus, it’s got adjustable tilt legs that deliver lasting comfort—everything you need to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great keyboard and mouse combo with single USB dongle
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this set and noticed the keyboard didn’t have a dongle. So I started a return and ordered another set. When the new set arrived, that keyboard still didn’t have a dongle. So, I took the dongle from the mouse and plugged it in only to find it connects both the mouse and the keyboard. That made me so happy that I canceled the return and am keeping the extra set as backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Keyboard for the Money!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard!! It feels so nice to type on and my hands don't get sore like they do on other keyboards I use. It is definitely worth the price!!! I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended, bad positioning of top row keys, F1 - F12 keys
reviews.reviewText: Bought just the keyboard in January, it is now September, keyboard is holding strong.ASWED keys are very slightly faded, been holding up well as I tend to game FPS style.I've tested at 105 wpm with 96% accuracy, but the huge downside for me is the proximity of the top row of keys, They are too close for my liking, I tend to tap them when hitting the numberic keys and backspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took some getting used to, but it is my go to keyboard/mouse combo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic keyboard good for work
reviews.reviewText: I had been trying to work on my small computer keyboard and it was taking me forever.This larger wireless keyboard has helped me to speed up my work load. I can type so much faster and I am much more productive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint / big value
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is the perfect size for when you ant to minimize footprint on the desk. And can't beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A key stopped working 4 days after return window closed
reviews.reviewText: Garbage. The 'A' key stopped working for no reason. Nothing is stuck in it. It just stopped responding. Of course the return window closed 4 days ago. This product is trash, buyer beware.
Conecté el teclado y el muse, solo es cuestión de leer el instructivo para que todo funcione correctamente.Muy lindo, y no ocupa mucho espacio. Ligero. Me gusta mucho.
